channel.title: Data Science Projects on Trey Hamilton
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Projects on Trey Hamilton

item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis and Modeling
item.description: In this Data Science project, we were approached by Blue Nile to perform the following tasks: Use data visualizations to explore how price is related to the other variables (carat, clarity, color, cut), as well as how the other variables may relate to each other. Use these findings to address the various claims on the diamond education page on Blue Nile. Fit an appropriate simple linear regression for price against carat and report the findings.
